sn26.5:1.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassajāya vedanāya uppādo ṭhiti …pe… jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo …pe….
sn26.5:2.3: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusamphassajāya vedanāya nirodho vūpasamo …pe…
sn26.5:2.5: yo manosamphassajāya vedanāya nirodho vūpasamo atthaṅgamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogānaṃ vūpasamo, jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
